```{r cleanup, include = FALSE}
library(rio)
library(tidyverse)
library(dplyr)
library(janitor)
library(ggplot2)
theme_set(theme_minimal())
library(knitr)
library(kableExtra)
library(ggthemes)
library(colorblindr)

d <- import("./MasterKickstarter.csv", setclass = "tibble") %>% 
  clean_names()

continental_us <- d %>% 
  select(-1:-3) %>% 
  filter(country == "USA" & county != "Non-USA")     # We looked at inverse of filter to see which cases were in USA == country but were also labeled as county != Non-USA. Those cases were those that were not part of the continental US
```

```{r split}
cumulative_data <- clean_data %>%
  group_by(academic_year, school, student_group, grade_level) %>%
  mutate(cn = cumsum(n))

continental_us_split <- continental_us %>% 
  group_by(state, county) %>% 
  nest()

str(continental_us_split)
```
